item.content:encoded: Twitter Upgrades Will Include Analytical Tools http://t.co/riELEcqy Twitter will unveil a series of new tools in the next few months, including sophisticated analytical tools, according to Erica Anderson, Twitter's manager for news and journalism. Anderson said the analytical tools will better help publishers track the reach of tweets sent through the microblogging service. She made her comments Saturday at Columbia University's social media weekend in New York.... Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Dutch ISPs Refuse To Block The Pirate Bay | TorrentFreak
item.description: Dutch ISPs Refuse To Block The Pirate Bay | TorrentFreak http://t.co/JUeZX84c via @torrentfreak
item.content:encoded: Dutch ISPs Refuse To Block The Pirate Bay | TorrentFreak http://t.co/JUeZX84c via @torrentfreak Two large ISPs in the Netherlands have said they will not be blocking subscriber access to The Pirate Bay, as demanded by the Hollywood supported anti-piracy outfit BREIN. T-Mobile and KPN argue that blocking websites is a threat to the open Internet, and suggest that the entertainment industry focuses on new business models instead. BREIN is now expected to take the ISPs to court. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: torrentfreak.com
